reference: If you have a quality, you should be proud of that.

reference: Much progress was made over the year in the area ofregional cooperation. While the quality and dimensionof this cooperation depends to a large extent on thecountries themselves, the CARDS programme hascontributed substantially in key areas such as tradefacilitation and development of regional infrastructures.
source: Tästä syystä Cards-tuessa on sisäänrakennettu ominaisuus, jonka ansiosta sitä voidaankäyttää epäyhtenäisessäkin tilanteessa ja se voidaanmukauttaa kunkin maan kulloiseenkin tilanteeseenkeskittämällä se niiden erityistarpeisiin.

source: Tämä on lausunnon ydin, ja sen puolelle haluan saada myös parlamentin!

errors.contrastive: That is the nucleus of the message and I hope to enlist Parliament's support for it.

source: Jutun ydin on se, että pikku kaverin mukaan - yrittäessään lavastaa teon onnettomuudeksi - he hankkivat myrkyllisen käärmeen - ja aikoivat antaa sen purra teitä.

source: Bulgarian talouden onnistuneen vakauttamisen ydin on ollut valuuttakomiteajärjestelmän kiinteä valuuttakurssi.

errors.contrastive: The nucleus of Bulgaria's successful stabilisation has been the operation of a fixed exchange rate under a currency board regime.

reference: He has been returned to us unharmed and with the help of the nanites our computer core has been reconstructed in time for the experiment.
source: Hän ei vahingoittunut. Naniittien avulla tietokoneen ydin korjattiin juuri ajoissa koetta varten.

errors.contrastive: He has been returned to us unharmed and with the help of the nanites our computer nucleus has been reconstructed in time for the experiment.

reference: Supporting the activities of SMEs is a core activity of the European Investment Bank: between 1993 and 1997, it disbursed almost ECU 11 billion to assist about 48 000 small and medium-scale projects within the Union.
source: Euroopan investointipankin ydin on pkyritysten toiminnan tukeminen. Vuosina 1 993- 1997 se käytti lähes 1 1 miljardia ecua likimäärin 48 000 pienen tai keskikokoisen hankkeen avustamiseen unionin rajojen sisäpuolella.

errors.contrastive: Supporting the activities of SMEs is a nucleus activity of the European Investment Bank: between 1993 and 1997, it dis­bursed almost ECU 11 billion to assist about 48 000 small and medium-scale projects within the Union.

reference: A famous Irish philosopher named Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel once wrote that the essence of tragedy isn't the conflict of right and wrong, its the conflict of right and right.
source: Irlantilasfilosofi Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel sanoi - että tragedian ydin on oikean ja oikean välinen konflikti.

errors.contrastive: A famous Irish philosopher named Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel once wrote that the nucleus of tragedy isn't the conflict of right and wrong, its the conflict of right and right.

reference: The European Council asks the IGC to base its work on the fact that the citizens are at the core of the European construction : the Union has the imperative duty to respond concretely to their needs and concerns.
source: Eurooppaneuvosto pyytää hallitustenvälistä konferenssia käyttämään työskentelynsä perustana sitä tosiasiaa, että kansalaiset ovat Euroopan rakentamisen ydin: unionin ehdottomana tehtävänä on vastata konkreettisesti kansalaistensa tarpeisiin ja huolenaiheisiin.

errors.contrastive: The European Council asks the IGC to base its work on the fact that the citizens are at the nucleus of the European construction : the Union has the imperative duty to respond concretely to their needs and concerns.

reference: That's the essence of gambling. You risk something.
source: Pelaamisen ydin on siinä, että laittaa jotakin peliin.

errors.contrastive: That's the nucleus of gambling. You risk something.

reference: The report is a response to a Commission communication which quite rightly takes as part of its theme the concept that services of general interest lie at the very heart of the European model of society.
source: Mietintö on vastaus komission tiedonantoon, jonka teemaan sisältyy aivan oikein käsitys siitä, että yleishyödylliset palvelut ovat eurooppalaisen yhteiskuntamallin ydin.

errors.contrastive: The report is a response to a Commission communication which quite rightly takes as part of its theme the concept that services of general interest lie at the very nucleus of the European model of society.

reference: The core of our defence is that the defendant's temporary insanity was triggered by this so-called trouble with Quill.
source: Puolustuksemme ydin on että vastaajan tilapäisen mielenhäiriön - laukaisi tämä niin sanottu harmi Quillin kanssa.

errors.contrastive: The nucleus of our defence is that the defendant's temporary insanity was triggered by this so-called trouble with Quill.

reference: The essence of my proposal is that we approve this amendment by Mr Dell'Alba, and that we thus allow petitions to also be submitted electronically.
source: Ehdotukseni ydin on se, että hyväksymme tämän Dell'Alban tekemän muutoksen ja että sallimme vetoomusten lähettämisen elektronisten välineiden kautta.

errors.contrastive: The nucleus of my proposal is that we approve this amendment by Mr Dell'Alba, and that we thus allow petitions to also be submitted electronically.

reference: By passing certain circuits through there to be used as a duo-dynetic field core..
source: Voin johtaa piirit siihen. Se olisi duodyneettinen ydin.

errors.contrastive: By passing certain circuits through there to be used as a duo-dynetic field nucleus..

reference: "The raft is doing good. We are on the way and morale is high. "
source: "Lautta on pysynyt kunnossa, ja moraali korkeana."

errors.contrastive: "The raft is doing good. We are on the way and morality is high. "

reference: ‘Not only do we now have higher staff morale and lower sickness, it also significantly benefits the retention of existing customers, and it is a real differentiator when winning new business and helping the company to expand.’
source: ”Henkilöstömme moraali on nyt korkeampi ja sairastelu vähäisempää, muttalisäksityösuojelustaonmerkittäväähyötyänykyisten asiakassuhteiden säilyttämisessä.

errors.contrastive: ‘Not only do we now have higher staff morality and lower sickness, it also significantly benefits the retention of existing customers, and it is a real differentiator when winning new business and helping the company to expand.’

reference: Every time an order is questioned, every time dissention is allowed to state its case, there's a corresponding decrease in overall morale.
source: Aina kun käsky kyseenalaistetaan, - aina kun niskoittelijoiden annetaan riehua vapaasti, - miehistön moraali laskee suunnattomasti.

errors.contrastive: Every time an order is questioned, every time dissention is allowed to state its case, there's a corresponding decrease in overall morality.

reference: The army is still experiencing disciplinary problems and its morale remains relatively low.
source: Armeijalla on edelleen kurinpitoon liittyviä ongelmia, ja sen moraali on suhteellisen alhainen.

errors.contrastive: The army is still experiencing disciplinary problems and its morality remains relatively low.

reference: Now the army's morale is strong and it all hinges on her!
source: Armeijan moraali on voimakas ja se kaikki riippuu hänestä!

errors.contrastive: Now the army's morality is strong and it all hinges on her!

reference: It's about undermining your enemy's will to fight, destroying the morale of his troops, sending the message that fighting back is useless... because the battle is already lost.
source: Kyse on vihollisen taisteluhalun heikentämisestä tuhoamalla joukkojen moraali, ja lähettämällä viesti, että vastarinta on hyödytöntä, koska taistelu on jo hävitty.

errors.contrastive: It's about undermining your enemy's will to fight, destroying the morality of his troops, sending the message that fighting back is useless... because the battle is already lost.

reference: These troops are in high spirits, and the morale is high.
source: Näiden joukkojen mieliala on korkealla ja moraali on tiukka.

errors.contrastive: These troops are in high spirits, and the morality is high.

reference: He boxed and returned those noses, instantly crushing his opponent's morale
source: Hän paketoi ja palautti nenät, välittömästi vastustajien moraali murskaantui.

errors.contrastive: He boxed and returned those noses, instantly crushing his opponent's morality

reference: I understand that morale's taken a hit on the flight deck
source: - Niin tekee. Ymmärtääkseni moraali on laskenut lentokannella.

errors.contrastive: I understand that morality's taken a hit on the flight deck

reference: What with the screaming and people catching on fire and all, by the end of the week,morale was pretty low.
source: Parkumisen ja ihmisten syttymisen jälkeen, moraali alkoi olla loppuviikosta heikko.

errors.contrastive: What with the screaming and people catching on fire and all, by the end of the week,morality was pretty low.

reference: The Allied Forces have not lost cohesion, and their morale is high.
source: Liittoutuneiden joukot ovat pysyneet yhtenäisinä ja moraali on korkealla.

errors.contrastive: The Allied Forces have not lost cohesion, and their morality is high.

reference: Finn has a point. I mean, haven't you noticed how low morale has been around here lately?
source: Ettekö ole huomanneet, miten alhainen moraali täällä vallitsee?

errors.contrastive: Finn has a point. I mean, haven't you noticed how low morality has been around here lately?

reference: If they know you don't have the aspiration of winning the throne Generals and soldiers may lose their morale
source: Jos he saavat tietää, että et taistele kruunusta, moraali kärsii.

errors.contrastive: If they know you don't have the aspiration of winning the throne Generals and soldiers may lose their morality

reference: The enemy is impressed with our fighting spirit But the morale of our men fall.
source: Vaikka miestemme rohkeus on tehnyt vaikutuksen viholliseen niin on sanottava että miestemme moraali laskee hitaasti.

errors.contrastive: The enemy is impressed with our fighting spirit But the morality of our men fall.

reference: A recent survey found employee morale has dropped from "low," which they were okay with... to "I'd like to burn this place down"... which, frankly, I'm surprised was one of the options.
source: Kyselyn mukaan työntekijöiden moraali oli tippunut siedettävästä "matalasta" - kohtaan: "Haluaisin polttaa koko paikan." Se oli yllättäen yksi vaihtoehdoista.

errors.contrastive: A recent survey found employee morality has dropped from "low," which they were okay with... to "I'd like to burn this place down"... which, frankly, I'm surprised was one of the options.

reference: One of the first things they teach you is that morality is a private and costly luxury.
source: Meille opetetaan, että moraali on yksityinen ja kallis ylellisyys.

errors.contrastive: One of the first things they teach you is that morale is a private and costly luxury.

reference: To borrow loosely from Brecht, first bellies are filled, then comes morality, and we know that capital is a great shark, and when it makes a killing in international business, the leftovers are few.
source: Ajattelen Brechtiä mukaillen: ensin ahnehditaan, sitten on vuorossa moraali, ja me tiedämme, että pääoma on suurin hai, ja kun se on nälkäinen kansainvälisessä kaupassa, niin jäljelle ei jääkään juuri mitään.

errors.contrastive: To borrow loosely from Brecht, first bellies are filled, then comes morale, and we know that capital is a great shark, and when it makes a killing in international business, the leftovers are few.

reference: I don't mean to cast aspersions on a dead guy, but, uh... Mr. Morality here?
source: En haluaisi herjata kuollutta miestä, mutta,hm... onko mr Moraali täällä?

errors.contrastive: I don't mean to cast aspersions on a dead guy, but, uh... Mr. morale here?

reference: These include public morality, public policy, public security and the protection of health and life of humans, animals or plants.
source: Näihin kuuluvat julkinen moraali, yleinen järjestys tai turvallisuus sekä ihmisten, eläinten tai kasvien terveyden ja elämän suojeleminen.

errors.contrastive: These include public morale, public policy, public security and the protection of health and life of humans, animals or plants.

reference: Power, ideals, the old morality, and practical military necessity.
source: Valta, ihanteet, vanha moraali ja sotilaallinen välttämättömyys.

errors.contrastive: Power, ideals, the old morale, and practical military necessity.

reference: I liked the conventional morality especially when you're in love.
source: Minusta tavallinen moraali oli hyvä. Ainakin kun rakastaa toisiaan.

reference: It was an easy target and therefore a suitable demonstration.
source: Se oli helppo maali ja sen vuoksi sopiva havainnolliseksi esitykseksi.

errors.contrastive: It was an easy goal and therefore a suitable demonstration.
It was an easy paint and therefore a suitable demonstration.

reference: It's a non-nuclear strike, which suggests that it's a secondary target.
source: Se ei ole atomipommi, mikä viittaa siihen, että se on toissijainen maali. - Koska se tapahtuu?

errors.contrastive: It's a non-nuclear strike, which suggests that it's a secondary goal.
It's a non-nuclear strike, which suggests that it's a secondary paint.

reference: Otherwise, the target would have been disabled. The Thunder wouldn't have been forced into a dive.
source: Emme olisi joutuneet sukeltamaan, jos maali olisi tuhoutunut.

errors.contrastive: Otherwise, the goal would have been disabled. The Thunder wouldn't have been forced into a dive.
Otherwise, the paint would have been disabled. The Thunder wouldn't have been forced into a dive.

reference: But with a target like that... If a man ain't awful careful, he could make a mighty serious mistake.
source: Mutta kun maali on tuossa voi tehdä vakavan erehdyksen, ellei ole varovainen.

errors.contrastive: But with a goal like that... If a man ain't awful careful, he could make a mighty serious mistake.
But with a paint like that... If a man ain't awful careful, he could make a mighty serious mistake.

reference: Well, it just proves what I always say, a good Samaritan is nothing but a good target.
source: Olen aina sanonut, että laupias samarialainen on hyvä maali.

errors.contrastive: Well, it just proves what I always say, a good Samaritan is nothing but a good goal.
Well, it just proves what I always say, a good Samaritan is nothing but a good paint.

reference: The target is symbolic as this is the base from which you would leave Washington.
source: Maali on symbolinen, sillä te poistutte sieltä lähtiessänne Washingtonista.

errors.contrastive: The goal is symbolic as this is the base from which you would leave Washington.
The paint is symbolic as this is the base from which you would leave Washington.

reference: With our limited equipment... it'll take three trips to carry enough bombs to destroy the target.
source: Joudumme tekemään kolme lentoa ennen kuin maali on tuhottu täysin.

errors.contrastive: With our limited equipment... it'll take three trips to carry enough bombs to destroy the goal.
With our limited equipment... it'll take three trips to carry enough bombs to destroy the paint.

reference: Only make a better target stopped, so... run all the way.
source: Pysähdyksissä olette vain helpompi maali, joten... juoskaa koko matka.

errors.contrastive: Only make a better goal stopped, so... run all the way.
Only make a better paint stopped, so... run all the way.

reference: If I had been, I wouldn't have been alone... And an easy target.
source: Jos olisin ollut, en olisi ollut yksin - ja helppo maali.

errors.contrastive: If I had been, I wouldn't have been alone... And an easy goal.
If I had been, I wouldn't have been alone... And an easy paint.

reference: I want you off the streets. You're too easy of a target.
source: Haluan sinut pois kadulta, olet liian helppo maali.

errors.contrastive: I want you off the streets. You're too easy of a goal.
I want you off the streets. You're too easy of a paint.

reference: - I'm sure it's not much of a target,... but we're at real close range.
source: Kolme. - En usko, että teet sen. - Se ei ole iso maali, mutta olen lähietäisyydellä.

errors.contrastive: - I'm sure it's not much of a goal,... but we're at real close range.
- I'm sure it's not much of a paint,... but we're at real close range.

reference: I'm too old and my backside is too easy a target.
source: Olen liian vanha ja selkäpuoleni on liian helppo maali.

errors.contrastive: I'm too old and my backside is too easy a goal.
I'm too old and my backside is too easy a paint.

reference: And when you take aim your eye, the dart and the target form a straight line.
source: Tähtää. Silmä, tikka ja maali ovat suorassa linjassa.

errors.contrastive: And when you take aim your eye, the dart and the goal form a straight line.
And when you take aim your eye, the dart and the paint form a straight line.

reference: Anyone in a rebel uniform who does not offer unconditional surrender is a legitimate target, Corporal.
source: Jokainen vapaaehtoinen, joka ei antaudu, on sallittu maali.

errors.contrastive: Anyone in a rebel uniform who does not offer unconditional surrender is a legitimate goal, Corporal.
Anyone in a rebel uniform who does not offer unconditional surrender is a legitimate paint, Corporal.

reference: Your eyes are twice the size of normal eyes; It's a bigger target.
source: Silmäsi ovat kaksi kertaa normaalia isommat, isompi maali.

errors.contrastive: Your eyes are twice the size of normal eyes; It's a bigger goal.
Your eyes are twice the size of normal eyes; It's a bigger paint.

reference: I suggest that Columbia withdraws to a safer distance... so that we don't make a single target.
source: Ehdotan että Columbia vetäytyy turvallisen matkan päähän, - jotta emme olisi yksi maali.

errors.contrastive: I suggest that Columbia withdraws to a safer distance... so that we don't make a single goal.
I suggest that Columbia withdraws to a safer distance... so that we don't make a single paint.

reference: The source of all her power. And she will use it all to stop you.
source: Kaiken hänen voimansa lähde ja hän käyttää sitä pysäyttääkseen teidät.

errors.contrastive: The spring of all her power. And she will use it all to stop you.
The fountain of all her power. And she will use it all to stop you.

reference: Passengers are no longer just numbers, no longer just a source of revenue, but real people with real names, real lives, real families and with real value.
source: Matkustajat ei vät ole enää pelkästään lukuja, pelkästään tulojen lähde vaan todellisia ihmisiä, joilla on todelliset nimet, todellinen elämä, todelliset perheet ja todellista arvoa.

errors.contrastive: Passengers are no longer just numbers, no longer just a spring of revenue, but real people with real names, real lives, real families and with real value.
Passengers are no longer just numbers, no longer just a fountain of revenue, but real people with real names, real lives, real families and with real value.

reference: No. I'm talking about a pain that's so intense the only way to stop it is to have its source removed.
source: Puhun kivusta, joka on niin suurta, että ainoa keino on poistaa sen lähde.

errors.contrastive: No. I'm talking about a pain that's so intense the only way to stop it is to have its spring removed.
No. I'm talking about a pain that's so intense the only way to stop it is to have its fountain removed.

reference: Mandrake, water is the source of all life. Seven-tenths of this Earth's surface is water.
source: Mandrake, vesi on kaiken elämän lähde.[ 70% maapallon pinta-alasta on vettä.

errors.contrastive: Mandrake, water is the spring of all life. Seven-tenths of this Earth's surface is water.
Mandrake, water is the fountain of all life. Seven-tenths of this Earth's surface is water.

reference: Mr President, knowledge will become the most important source of work and prosperity and that knowledge will become outdated more and more quickly.
source: Tieto, arvoisa puhemies, on tulevaisuudessa työn ja hyvinvoinnin tärkein lähde, ja tieto vanhenee vastaisuudessa yhä nopeammin.

errors.contrastive: Mr President, knowledge will become the most important spring of work and prosperity and that knowledge will become outdated more and more quickly.
Mr President, knowledge will become the most important fountain of work and prosperity and that knowledge will become outdated more and more quickly.

reference: But I will show you now that it can be a source of great power.
source: Mutta näytän sinulle nyt, - että se voi olla suuren voiman lähde.

errors.contrastive: But I will show you now that it can be a spring of great power.
But I will show you now that it can be a fountain of great power.

reference: Salt is used to transform the taste of food and bread is the single largest source of dietary salt.
source: Suolaa käytetään ruoan maun muuttamiseen, ja leipä on suurin suolan lähde ruokavaliossa.

errors.contrastive: Salt is used to transform the taste of food and bread is the single largest spring of dietary salt.
Salt is used to transform the taste of food and bread is the single largest fountain of dietary salt.

reference: I would disown you, or I'd disown the God who is the source of all wisdom.
source: Joutuisin kieltämään teidät tai jumalan, joka on viisauden lähde.

errors.contrastive: I would disown you, or I'd disown the God who is the spring of all wisdom.
I would disown you, or I'd disown the God who is the fountain of all wisdom.

reference: The sale of TV rights is an important source of income for associations and clubs organizing sporting events.
source: TVoikeuksien myynti on merkittävä tulon lähde urheilutapahtumia järjestäville liitoille ja seuroille.

errors.contrastive: The sale of TV rights is an important spring of income for associations and clubs organizing sporting events.
The sale of TV rights is an important fountain of income for associations and clubs organizing sporting events.

reference: But that is not the reason why we should fear them. That is not the source of their power.
source: Se ei saa olla syy pelkoon, sillä se ei ole heidän voimansa lähde.

errors.contrastive: But that is not the reason why we should fear them. That is not the spring of their power.
But that is not the reason why we should fear them. That is not the fountain of their power.

reference: Reproduction is authorised, except for commercial purposes, provided the source is acknowledged and a copy is sent to the Foundation.
source: Jäljentäminen sallitaan muihin kuin kaupallisiin tarkoituksiin, jos lähde mainitaan ja säätiölle lähetetään kappale.

errors.contrastive: Reproduction is authorised, except for commercial purposes, provided the spring is acknowledged and a copy is sent to the Foundation.
Reproduction is authorised, except for commercial purposes, provided the fountain is acknowledged and a copy is sent to the Foundation.

reference: A source close to the defence hinted that the alleged victim would not have made a strong witness for the state.
source: Puolustusta lähellä oleva lähde vihjasi, että niin kutsuttu uhri ei olisi ollut tarpeeksi vahva todistaja.

errors.contrastive: A spring close to the defence hinted that the alleged victim would not have made a strong witness for the state.
A fountain close to the defence hinted that the alleged victim would not have made a strong witness for the state.

reference: And this means not only tracking our rates of use but the rates of earthly regeneration as well such as how long it takes for, say a tree to grow or a spring to replenish.
source: Tämä ei tarkoita ainoastaan kulutuksemme seurantaa vaan myös uusiutumisnopeutta. Esimerkiksi kuinka kauan kestää kun puu kasvaa tai lähde täyttyy.

errors.contrastive: And this means not only tracking our rates of use but the rates of earthly regeneration as well such as how long it takes for, say a tree to grow or a source to replenish.
And this means not only tracking our rates of use but the rates of earthly regeneration as well such as how long it takes for, say a tree to grow or a informant to replenish.

reference: I actually have no interest in the Fountain whatsoever, so, if your heart is set, you may drop me off anywhere you like.
source: Lähde ei kiinnosta minua tippaakaan, joten voit- tipauttaa minut minne vain.

errors.contrastive: I actually have no interest in the source whatsoever, so, if your heart is set, you may drop me off anywhere you like.
I actually have no interest in the informant whatsoever, so, if your heart is set, you may drop me off anywhere you like.

reference: Here it is written that the Fountain of Destiny lies within easy march.
source: Tähän on kirjoitettu - että Kohtalon lähde on lyhyen matkan päässä täältä.

errors.contrastive: Here it is written that the source of Destiny lies within easy march.
Here it is written that the informant of Destiny lies within easy march.

reference: "Price is a fountain of nothingness when compared to one man's dream."
source: "Hinta on merkityksettömyyden lähde, kun sitä verrataan miehen unelmaan."

errors.contrastive: "Price is a source of nothingness when compared to one man's dream."
"Price is a informant of nothingness when compared to one man's dream."

reference: Dr Farallon, the plans call for the particle fountain to lift 500 kg per minute from the surface.
source: Tohtori Farallon, alkuperäisten suunnitelmien mukaan lähde nostaa 500 kiloa minuutissa planeetan pinnalta.

errors.contrastive: Dr Farallon, the plans call for the particle source to lift 500 kg per minute from the surface.
Dr Farallon, the plans call for the particle informant to lift 500 kg per minute from the surface.

reference: But there is a love... that is like a spring coming up from the earth.
source: Mutta on myös rakkautta, - joka on kuin maasta nouseva lähde.

errors.contrastive: But there is a love... that is like a source coming up from the earth.
But there is a love... that is like a informant coming up from the earth.

reference: If it fails, we'll still have time to shut down the fountain.
source: Jos se ei toimi, meillä on silti aikaa sulkea lähde.

errors.contrastive: If it fails, we'll still have time to shut down the source.
If it fails, we'll still have time to shut down the informant.

reference: The location she mentioned. Trees maybe... a fountain.
source: Hän mainitsi paikan, jossa on puita ja ehkä lähde.

errors.contrastive: The location she mentioned. Trees maybe... a source.
The location she mentioned. Trees maybe... a informant.

reference: There's a spring here, but you'll never make it.
source: Tuolla on lähde, mutta ette jaksa sinne asti.

errors.contrastive: There's a source here, but you'll never make it.
There's a informant here, but you'll never make it.

reference: If he came to Romarins... he'd locate the spring in a flash!
source: Jos hän tulee tänne varpuineen - se lähde löytyy silmänräpäyksessä.

errors.contrastive: If he came to Romarins... he'd locate the source in a flash!
If he came to Romarins... he'd locate the informant in a flash!

reference: Freshwater spring on the other side. Water for the horses when they come from raids.
source: Siellä on lähde, jossa hevoset juotetaan ryöstöretkien jälkeen.

errors.contrastive: Freshwater source on the other side. Water for the horses when they come from raids.
Freshwater informant on the other side. Water for the horses when they come from raids.

reference: If the fountain keeps you awake, they give you free earplugs.
source: 750 taalaa kuussa. Jos lähde valvottaa, saa korvatulpat.

errors.contrastive: If the source keeps you awake, they give you free earplugs.
If the informant keeps you awake, they give you free earplugs.

reference: The fountain was the morning always completely dry, as if nothing had happened.
source: Aamuisin lähde oli täysin kuiva kuin mitään ei olisi tapahtunut.

errors.contrastive: The source was the morning always completely dry, as if nothing had happened.
The informant was the morning always completely dry, as if nothing had happened.

reference: Nicholas Ballard, my, uh, grandfather. One of Nick's obsessions was finding the so-called Fountain of Youth.
source: Nicholas Ballard, isoisäni, - jonka yksi pakkomielle oli löytää nuoruuden lähde.

errors.contrastive: Nicholas Ballard, my, uh, grandfather. One of Nick's obsessions was finding the so-called source of Youth.
Nicholas Ballard, my, uh, grandfather. One of Nick's obsessions was finding the so-called informant of Youth.

reference: Well, Eagleton lies on top of a hot spring which creates a micro-climate zone. We are... truly blessed.
source: Eagletonin alla on kuuma lähde, joka luo taivaallisen mikroilmaston.

errors.contrastive: Well, Eagleton lies on top of a hot source which creates a micro-climate zone. We are... truly blessed.
Well, Eagleton lies on top of a hot informant which creates a micro-climate zone. We are... truly blessed.

reference: He says there's a spring... over there across the wash.
source: Hän sanoo, että uoman toisella puolella on lähde.

errors.contrastive: He says there's a source... over there across the wash.
He says there's a informant... over there across the wash.

reference: For thou art begat by God and this world is but a spring to slake thy sacred thirst!
source: Sinä olet Jumalan luomus, - ja tämä maailma on vain pyhän janoni sammuttamisen lähde."

errors.contrastive: For thou art begat by God and this world is but a source to slake thy sacred thirst!
For thou art begat by God and this world is but a informant to slake thy sacred thirst!

reference: If that spring were near us, we'd have no problem.
source: Olisipa meilläkin sellainen lähde. Siihen loppuisivat kaikki ongelmat.

errors.contrastive: If that source were near us, we'd have no problem.
If that informant were near us, we'd have no problem.

reference: You can't even say "Fountain of Troy" at this cheer camp.
source: Leirillä ei saa sanoakaan: "Troijan lähde. "

errors.contrastive: You can't even say "source of Troy" at this cheer camp.
You can't even say "informant of Troy" at this cheer camp.

reference: Even though there were so many, still the net did not tear.
source: Ja vaikka niitä oli niin paljon, ei verkko revennyt.

errors.contrastive: Even though there were so many, still the grid did not tear.

reference: As the aim of the Mobility Joint European Project is the creation of a network, in addition to the minimum requirements of a consortium, the involvement of further partner country and EU consortium members is expected.
source: Yhteiseurooppalaisen liikkuvuushankkeen tavoitteena on luoda yhteenliittymän vähimmäisvaatimusten lisäksi verkko, ja myös muiden kumppanuusmaiden ja EU:n yhteenliittymän jäsenten edellytetään osallistuvan siihen.

errors.contrastive: As the aim of the Mobility Joint European Project is the creation of a grid, in addition to the minimum requirements of a consortium, the involvement of further partner country and EU consortium members is expected.

reference: For this network to be saying otherwise offends me as a citizen and principal.
source: Se, että verkko väittää muuta, loukkaa minua kansalaisena ja rehtorina.

errors.contrastive: For this grid to be saying otherwise offends me as a citizen and principal.

reference: This network acts in close cooperation with the WHO and the International Union Against Tuberculosis and Lung Disease.
source: Kyseinen verkko toimii tiiviissä yhteistyössä WHO:n ja tuberkuloosin ja keuhkotautien vastaisen kansainvälisen liiton kanssa.

errors.contrastive: This grid acts in close cooperation with the WHO and the International Union Against Tuberculosis and Lung Disease.

reference: And yours, son, is the most important mission. Drop that net on any punk that gets near our front door.
source: Tehtäväsi on pudottaa verkko, jos huligaanit tulevat talollemme.

errors.contrastive: And yours, son, is the most important mission. Drop that grid on any punk that gets near our front door.

reference: Hold it Mohammed, get ready to lay this net over the stern.
source: Odottakaa! Mohammed! Valmistautukaa laskemaan tuo verkko veteen perästä.

errors.contrastive: Hold it Mohammed, get ready to lay this grid over the stern.

reference: Regional network involving universities and other consortium members from two or several partner countries and the European Union.
source: Alueellinen verkko, johon kuuluu korkeakouluja ja yhteenliittymän muita jäseniä kahdesta tai useammasta kumppanuusmaasta sekä Euroopan unionista.

errors.contrastive: Regional grid involving universities and other consortium members from two or several partner countries and the European Union.

reference: This I.S. net is insane. I've never seen so much interconnectivity in a single system.
source: Sir, tämä verkko on ihan seko, en ole nähnyt mitään vastaavaa.

errors.contrastive: This I.S. grid is insane. I've never seen so much interconnectivity in a single system.

reference: In future we should also ensure that there are connections between the various freight freeways so that a genuine network for international freight can be created.
source: Tulevaisuudessa meidän tulisi myös varmistaa, että eri rahtiliikenteen valtaväylien välillä on yhteydet, jotta voi daan luoda aito verkko kansainvälistä rahtiliikennettä varten.

errors.contrastive: In future we should also ensure that there are connections between the various freight freeways so that a genuine grid for international freight can be created.

reference: These two factors are leading to the introduction of an integrated transEuropean transport network, including an intermodal dimension which is set to develop.
source: Nämä kaksi edellä mainittua asiaa aiheuttavat sen, että kehitetään Euroopan laajuisen liikenteen integroitu verkko, johon sisältyy intermodaalinen ulottuvuus, jota on tarve laajentaa.

errors.contrastive: These two factors are leading to the introduction of an integrated transEuropean transport grid, including an intermodal dimension which is set to develop.

reference: Sections of the grid continually need recalibration... and are prone to false signals.
source: Verkko vaatii alati uudelleenkalibrointia, ja se on altis väärille signaaleille.

errors.contrastive: Sections of the net continually need recalibration... and are prone to false signals.
Sections of the network continually need recalibration... and are prone to false signals.

reference: If that Volm weapon works, the grid comes down, and the Volm land, I don't think this war's gonna last much longer.
source: - Jos Volmien ase toimii, verkko tuhoutuu, ja Volmit laskeutuvat, niin en usko tämän sodan jatkuvan enää kauaa.

errors.contrastive: If that Volm weapon works, the net comes down, and the Volm land, I don't think this war's gonna last much longer.
If that Volm weapon works, the network comes down, and the Volm land, I don't think this war's gonna last much longer.

reference: If the grid is not destroyed, feeding that much power back into it could accelerate the process.
source: Jos verkko ei tuhoudu, suuren virtamäärän syöttäminen saattaisi nopeuttaa prosessia.

errors.contrastive: If the net is not destroyed, feeding that much power back into it could accelerate the process.
If the network is not destroyed, feeding that much power back into it could accelerate the process.

reference: The grid was designed to function in the planet's original atmosphere... but terraforming's made the air much thicker.
source: Verkko suunniteltiin toimimaan alkuperäisessä ilmakehässä, mutta maanmuokkaus teki ilmasta tiheämpää.

errors.contrastive: The net was designed to function in the planet's original atmosphere... but terraforming's made the air much thicker.
The network was designed to function in the planet's original atmosphere... but terraforming's made the air much thicker.

reference: Okay, this is a grid of dowatown streets that Meechum knew well enough not to use his GPS, but not explaining his other known trips.
source: Tämä on verkko niistä keskustan kaduista jotka Meechum tunsi ilman GPS-laitetta mutta ei selitä muita retkiä.

errors.contrastive: Okay, this is a net of dowatown streets that Meechum knew well enough not to use his GPS, but not explaining his other known trips.
Okay, this is a network of dowatown streets that Meechum knew well enough not to use his GPS, but not explaining his other known trips.

reference: Tower's down, grid's down -- I call that a success!
source: - Torni kaatui, verkko sammui, se onnistui!

errors.contrastive: Tower's down, net's down -- I call that a success!
Tower's down, network's down -- I call that a success!

reference: Well, the C.I.A. analysts think the code treats each book page like a grid, so the first number tells you what page number, the second's the number of letters across the bottom, the third's the number of letters up.
source: - Kirjan sivut ovat kuin verkko. Numerot viittaavat sivuihin ja järjestykseen.

errors.contrastive: Well, the C.I.A. analysts think the code treats each book page like a net, so the first number tells you what page number, the second's the number of letters across the bottom, the third's the number of letters up.

Well, the C.I.A. analysts think the code treats each book page like a network, so the first number tells you what page number, the second's the number of letters across the bottom, the third's the number of letters up.

reference: So maybe The Effect and the grid are totally unrelated.
source: Ehkäpä ilmiö ja verkko eivät ole mitenkään sidoksissa toisiinsa.

errors.contrastive: So maybe The Effect and the net are totally unrelated.
So maybe The Effect and the network are totally unrelated.

reference: We need to take out the grid, and I need to get Karen!
source: Meidän pitää tuhota se verkko, ja minun pitää saada Karen!

errors.contrastive: We need to take out the net, and I need to get Karen!
We need to take out the network, and I need to get Karen!

reference: That lightning took out power lines leading to the main generator, and the grid just couldn't handle it.
source: Salama iski päägeneraattoriin johtaviin voimalinjoihin, ja verkko petti. Missä olitte valojen sammuessa?

errors.contrastive: That lightning took out power lines leading to the main generator, and the net just couldn't handle it.
That lightning took out power lines leading to the main generator, and the network just couldn't handle it.

reference: Hal, kill the grid. And, Gordy, take a look around the lab.
source: Hal, hävitä verkko, Ja Gordy, vilkaise laboratorion ympärille.

errors.contrastive: Hal, kill the net. And, Gordy, take a look around the lab.
Hal, kill the network. And, Gordy, take a look around the lab.

reference: This should bypass the grid and hook us directly... with main control.
source: Tämän pitäisi ohittaa verkko ja kytkeä meidät suoraan - päähallintatasolle.

errors.contrastive: This should bypass the net and hook us directly... with main control.
This should bypass the network and hook us directly... with main control.

reference: Our rescue mission to Sigma III has been halted by an immense grid and an untimely visit from Q.
source: Pelastustehtävämme Sigma 3:en - on pysäyttänyt suunnaton verkko ja Q:n huonosti ajoitettu vierailu.

errors.contrastive: Our rescue mission to Sigma III has been halted by an immense net and an untimely visit from Q.
Our rescue mission to Sigma III has been halted by an immense network and an untimely visit from Q.

reference: Plasma coil interlocks are in place. Deflector grid is charged and standing by.
source: Plasmakelan lukot ovat paikoillaan, ohjauslevyn verkko on valmiudessa.

errors.contrastive: Plasma coil interlocks are in place. Deflector net is charged and standing by.
Plasma coil interlocks are in place. Deflector network is charged and standing by.

reference: I'm stagnating, Jen, like a packet of crisps on the roof.
source: Olen toimeton, Jen. Kuin paketti muroja katolla.

errors.contrastive: I'm stagnating, Jen, like a parcel of crisps on the roof.
I'm stagnating, Jen, like a package of crisps on the roof.
I'm stagnating, Jen, like a pack of crisps on the roof.

reference: One letter and the packet goes to Aunt Pat. The other letter stays here with me.
source: Toinen kirjeistä ja paketti menevät Pat-tädille, - toinen kirje jää tänne minulle.

errors.contrastive: One letter and the parcel goes to Aunt Pat. The other letter stays here with me.
One letter and the package goes to Aunt Pat. The other letter stays here with me.
One letter and the pack goes to Aunt Pat. The other letter stays here with me.

reference: But I have the packet, so I'm clearly allowed to have them.
source: Minulla on paketti, - ja saan käyttää näitä.

errors.contrastive: But I have the parcel, so I'm clearly allowed to have them.
But I have the package, so I'm clearly allowed to have them.
But I have the pack, so I'm clearly allowed to have them.

reference: As I see it, they only have one chance.

reference: The Commission has strongly supported the work of Cypriot women from both communities towards peace which resulted in March last year in a conference held in Brussels under the title 'Women speak out: give peace a chance'.

reference: Something tells me I've got a better chance of survival if I go to the police.

reference: With this proposal, we have a chance to give many farmers the incentive to switch to organic methods, while at the same time benefiting the environment.
source: Tämän ehdotuksen ansiosta meillä on mahdollisuus antaa useammille maanviljelijöille se sysäys, joka voi saada heidät siirtymään luonnonmukaiseen viljelyyn, ja samalla toimimme ympäristön hyväksi.

errors.contrastive: We now have the shot to come up with a viable solution, as I believe the rapporteur, Mr Malerba, has also recognised in his report when he calls for cooperation.

reference: Instead, those concerned should be given a chance to complete their ongoing structural adjustments as quickly as possible.
